attributes.action: Give everybody the opportunity to get a drop kerb for their property
attributes.additional_details: Some households can not afford to pay for a drop kerb which means they illegally park as they have no other option and could in future face fines which could cause financial difficulties
attributes.background: With the new law coming in about fining people who park on the kerb I think it's only fair that people are given the opportunity to have a drop kerb put in so a drive way can be made in some cases if cars don't park on kerb emergency services can't get through streets as they are to narrow

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Dealing with applications for dropped kerbs is the responsibility of your local council.

You can find out more about applying for a dropped kerb here: 
https://www.gov.uk/apply-dropped-kerb
